page.title: 04QUARRINGTON CLUB & TRIP
page.content: Every year the Working men's Club organises a trip to Whitley Bay.About 6 weeks beforehand we get a form to fill in to say how many are going and their ages. There are 4 buses.We set off at 9.00am and return at 5.00pm.Often people hire deck chairs and tents.The club gives all of the children Â£2.00 each.This year (1985) we are going on June 29th. I go with my mam,dad,brother and sister.First we go on the beach then at 1.00pm we go to the shops.Later we go on the dodgems and other shows at the fairground.We buy candy rock for Nana and Granda.Then it's back to the beach for a picnic.After that we go down to the sea until it is time for the bus to go home. The Club has a snooker room,lounge and a bar.There is a juke box and a television.
